auto_fixable.rationale: This verification already verifies 'specifications/Requirements.md#leaf-requirement' which derives from 'specifications/Requirements.md#parent-requirement'. Verification traces automatically roll up through derivedFrom relations, so verifying the leaf requirement is sufficient.

needs_manual_review.rationale: This element has derivedFrom to both 'specifications/Requirements.md#parent-requirement' and its ancestor 'specifications/Requirements.md#root-requirement'. The hierarchy chain may already be established through the parent. Review if the direct link to the ancestor is semantically necessary.
